ComicInfo.Summary:
When Toulon's Puppets were freed to live in the flesh once more they expected to find their happy endings. Unfortunately, death continues to follow them... but this time they are on the wrong side of the wooden bodies.
Both the tension and body count rise as "THE REBIRTH" continues!
